test_name: Tier-1 Dispersion Curve — Discrete vs Continuum (4th-Order, GPU)
description: High-resolution Tier-1 dispersion diagnostic using a 4th-order Laplacian and FFT-based ω(k) extraction. Validates Lorentz continuum limit ω² = c²k² + χ² and discrete-theory correction curve.
